    • enableTelecomManager

      @Deprecated public Configuration.Builder enableTelecomManager(boolean enableTelecomManager)
      Deprecated.
      Use telecomIntegrationMode(com.exolve.voicesdk.TelecomIntegrationMode) instead.
      Enable/disable Android TelecomManager SDK's implementation.
      Requires READ_PHONE_STATE permission to place calls.
      Parameters:
      enableTelecomManager - enable/disable
      Returns:
      builder instance
